DOC.brief_summary: Intervention studying the effect of a low-carbohydrate/high-fat (LCHF) diet as well as on bout of exercise in combination with either a normal diet or a LCHF diet, in relation to glucose metabolism, insulin sensitivity, lipid profile and body composition.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Low-carbohydrate/High-fat Diet on Glucose Tolerance and Lipid Profile in Lean, Healthy Women
DOC.criteria: Females Normal weight BMI between 18.5 and 25 Moderately trained Smokers/tobacco users pregnancy familial cardiovasculardisease diabetes or reduced glucose tolerance under or overweight (BMI under 18.5 or over 25) top athletes
